document_data.name: Relve Langral
document_data.deathnotes: or earlier; killed by fellow adventurers
document_data.turnednotes: or earlier; rose as a [[blueflame ghost]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Relve Langral''' was a [[blueflame ghost]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], once an adventurer among [[the Nine]], in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was a little more talkative than Treth Halonter.
document_data.Possessions: He carried a sword, even as a ghost.
document_data.Description: He was shorter than [[Treth Halonter]]; while a blueflame ghost, he smiled constantly.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|307-308|29}}
document_data.Relationships: While human, Relve Langral had been one of [[the Nine]], a band of adventurers led by [[Laeral Silverhand]]. As a blueflame ghost, he was controlled by [[Marlin Stormserpent]].
document_data.Abilities: When a blueflame ghost, Relve Langral could walk through walls.
